q_en: What are the orders for PolyU?

steps.sql: SELECT o.* FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve all orders associated with the customer named 'PolyU' by joining the orders and customers tables.

response:
Sure thing! Here are the orders for the customer named "PolyU":

| Order ID | Order Name   | Created At          |
|----------|--------------|---------------------|
| 1        | PolyU_Tshirt | January 10, 2024    |
| 9        | PolyU_Skirt  | May 10, 2024        |

Looks like PolyU has some stylish choices! 😄 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!
